sentences.en: A good sharp dressing counterpointed the sweetness of the dried fruit.
sentences.cn: 味道浓烈的上好调味品和香甜的干果形成有趣的对比。

sentences.en: Apply a dressing to the wound and bandage it.
sentences.cn: 给伤口盖上敷料并用绷带包扎起来。

sentences.en: Cross-dressing is far more common than we realise.
sentences.cn: 变装现象要远比我们认识到的更加普遍。

sentences.en: Drizzle the remaining dressing over the duck and salad.
sentences.cn: 将剩下的调料淋在鸭肉和色拉上。

sentences.en: Fry remaining peppers, adding a little more dressing if necessary.
sentences.cn: 用油炸一下剩下的辣椒，如果需要再加点调味汁。

sentences.en: He criticized them for dressing outrageously and posing pretentiously.
sentences.cn: 他批评她们衣着暴露而且矫揉造作。

sentences.en: He just sat in the dressing-room staring into space.
sentences.cn: 他直愣愣地坐在化妆间里。

sentences.en: I gave him a good dressing-down.
I love dressing up to look seductive.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢打扮得性感一些。

sentences.en: Miss Finkelstein will put a dressing on your thumb.
sentences.cn: 芬克尔斯坦小姐会为你包扎拇指的。

sentences.en: Mix the ingredients for the dressing in a bowl.
sentences.cn: 在碗里将各种原料混成调料。

sentences.en: She crept from the bed and fumbled for her dressing gown.
sentences.cn: 她从床上蹑手蹑脚地爬起来，摸索着自己的晨衣。

sentences.en: She was touching the dressing gingerly with both hands.
sentences.cn: 她双手小心翼翼地抚摸着伤口处的绷带。

sentences.en: The little black dress is the anithesis of fussy dressing.
sentences.cn: 与花哨的打扮形成鲜明对比的是这件小黑裙子。

sentences.en: Wood was now comfortably enfolded in a woolly dressing-gown.
sentences.cn: 伍德正舒服地穿着件羊毛晨衣。

words.tran_cn: 穿好衣服的；打扮好的；去内脏及分割加工好的（特指动物，如鱼，禽类等）
盛装舞步；花式骑术训练；驯马技术
装饰；给…穿衣；布置（dress的过去分词）
给…穿衣；为…打扮（dress的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 选矿机；锻钎机；钻头修整机；切飞边冲床；矫正机
法式生菜调味酱，法式凉菜调味汁
n. 千岛汁；千岛酱；千岛沙拉酱
粉饰；修饰外表；橱窗装饰
绷带，伤口敷料；创伤敷料

trans.tran_cn: （给…）穿衣， 打扮（dress的现在分词）
